sourcesContent:
<form (ngSubmit)="submitRequest()" #form="ngForm">
    <input name="type" [(ngModel)]="request.type" required placeholder="Type de congé" />
    <input type="date" name="startDate" [(ngModel)]="request.startDate" required />
    <input type="date" name="endDate" [(ngModel)]="request.endDate" required />
    <textarea name="justification" [(ngModel)]="request.justification" placeholder="Justification"></textarea>
    <button type="submit">Envoyer la demande</button>
  </form>
